tooltip.config.waterdripsound.dripChance:
Chance for a drip particle to spawn when a block is randomly animated
One in 10 = Vanilla, higher means less common
tooltip.config.waterdripsound.blockAnima:
Multiplies the max range for block particle effects
(drips, smoke, falling leaves, fireflies, bubble columns, etc)
Also affects some blocks' ambient sounds (fire, lava, portals, etc)
1.0 = Vanilla, higher means particles can spawn further away

Multiplies the number of blocks that update particle effects each tick
This has a noticeable performance impact the higher you set it!
1.0 = Vanilla, higher means more blocks spawn particles
To keep the same density as vanilla, this should be the square of the range
(ie. 2.0 range -> 4.0 count, 3.0 range -> 9.0 count, etc)
config.waterdripsound.blockAnimateNotSup: §eBlock Particle options disabled due to a mod conflict:
tooltip.config.waterdripsound.useDripsto:
If enabled, uses the Dripstone water/lava
 drip sounds added in 1.17.
If not, uses sounds from older
 versions of the mod.
